cards.name: Total Revenue (Last 30 Days)
cards.query: SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed' AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'

cards.name: New Customers (Last 30 Days)
cards.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'

cards.name: Average Order Value
cards.query: SELECT AVG(total_amount) FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed' AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'

cards.name: Daily Revenue Trend
cards.query: SELECT DATE(created_at) as date, SUM(total_amount) as revenue FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed' AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY date

cards.name: Top Selling Products
cards.query: SELECT * FROM product_performance ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 20

cards.name: Low Stock Alert
cards.query: SELECT product_name, current_stock, stock_status FROM product_performance WHERE stock_status IN ('Low Stock', 'Out of Stock')

cards.name: Category Performance
cards.query: SELECT category_name, SUM(total_revenue) as revenue FROM product_performance GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY revenue DESC

cards.name: Customer Lifetime Value Distribution
cards.query: SELECT estimated_annual_value FROM customer_lifetime_value WHERE total_orders > 0

cards.name: Customer Segments
cards.query: SELECT customer_segment, COUNT(*) as count FROM customer_lifetime_value GROUP BY customer_segment

cards.name: Sales Funnel
cards.query: SELECT * FROM sales_funnel WHERE metric_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'
